How would you advise I go about joining a faction?

Ha! Don't think it's going to be cheap, because I'll need to put my head on the block for you! I'll need to call in a few favours, grease a few palms - you know... Then, I might be able to put in a good word for you. But it will cost you 250,000Ru. Knowing you, though... well, just go somewhere else for a while and piss somebody else off, or it will cost you even more next time - at least another 100,000Ru - if you're still alive, that is...
Duty have put a price on my head! Can you get them off my back?
I want to join Duty
Every member of Freedom wants to kill me! Can you do anything?
I want to join Freedom
I need to establish a good relationship with the Loners
No, forget it...

These services don't come cheap, you know. The more problems you stir up with a faction, the more it'll cost to restore your relationship with them
Give me a minute to check on it for you...
 
There, it's done...
Are you certain that you wanted to do this?

I'm told that you really pissed these guys off! You really need to bring it down a notch, Marked One! I won't always be able to bail you out like this. Remember this the next time you decide to go all 'Chuck Norris' on everyone, okay?
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with Duty
Yes, please sign me up with Duty
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with Freedom
Yes, please sign me up with Freedom
Yes, I want to restore my relationship with the Stalker community
All's well that ends well. Thank you!
I want to convert to the Monolithian faith
Yes, I want you to put me in touch with the Monolith
I heard that the Military are taking on new recruits
Yes, you heard correctly. But you're not serious, are you? Why would you want to do that?
I'd like you to put me in touch with the Bandits
Yeah. Yeah. I understand perfectly
I'd like to become a Loner once more
Yes, I understand
I've decided to become a Mercenary
Please put me in touch with the Mercs
Can you put me in touch with the Scientists?
Yes, I want to help the Scientists. I feel it's my responsibility. Maybe even get an education. Not just a job, either, but a career!
